pr_title: Fix portaldump json format to match new genes API format

timeline.message: fix format of portaldump to match API json

timeline.bodyText: I think this correction does not work in CI. CI runs still on python 3.4. I propose to remove this for now.
timeline.author: pvannierop
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -4765,7 +4765,7 @@ def validateStudyTags(tags_file_path, logger):
             extra={'filename_': tags_file_path})
         with open(tags_file_path, 'r') as stream:
             try:
-                parsedYaml = yaml.load(stream)
+                parsedYaml = yaml.load(stream, Loader=yaml.FullLoader)
